caption: Agent Skill Artifact
description: A file or resource referenced by a skill package.
name: agentskills_artifact

path.caption: Path
path.description: Relative path of the artifact inside the skill package.

required.caption: Required
required.description: Indicates whether this artifact is required for skill execution.

artifact_hash.caption: Artifact Hash
artifact_hash.description: Optional digest for artifact integrity verification.

locator.caption: Locator
locator.description: External locator when the artifact is hosted outside of the skill package.
